history.proof: intros d sigma Href Hcorrect. unfold DTA_ref_ok, DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy. destruct d as [p a]. simpl. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature Href : DTA_ref_ok (dta p a) Hcorrect : dta_correct_wrt_sign (dta p a) sigma Unable to unify "match DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty ?M1854) ?M1854 with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end" with "match match MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p) a with | Some _ => dta (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p) a | None => dta (M1 state 0%N (M0 prec_list)) 0%N end with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> DTA_ref_ok (DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy d)

Premises:
DTA_ref_ok = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end : DTA -> Prop
DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy = fun d : DTA => DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty_lazy d) d : DTA -> DTA
signature = Map nat : Set
Inductive DTA : Set := dta : preDTA -> ad -> DTA
dta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta d0 _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma end : DTA -> signature -> Prop
DTA_kill_ref_ok_invar : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> DTA_ref_ok (DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty d) d)
DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign (DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy d) sigma
kill_empty_lazy_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign (DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy d) sigma
kill_empty_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign (DTA_kill_empty_states d) sigma
DTA_kill_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d : DTA) (m : Map bool) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign (DTA_kill m d) sigma
dta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_compat_check d sigma = true
dta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_compat_check d sigma = true -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : DTA), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> dta_compatible d d'
dta_ref_ok_check_complete : forall d : DTA, dta_ref_ok_check d = true -> DTA_ref_ok d
dta_ref_ok_check_correct : forall d : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_ref_ok_check d = true
preDTA_kill_ref_ok_invar : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), preDTA_ref_ok d -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> preDTA_ref_ok (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d)
preDTA_kill_ref_ok_distinct_invar : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d d -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> preDTA_ref_ok_distinct (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d)
states_kill_aux_ref_ok_invar : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (sigma : signature), state_ref_ok s d -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> state_ref_ok (states_kill_aux (dta_non_empty_states d) s) (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d)
preDTA_kill_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (preDTA_kill m d) sigma
prec_list_kill_ref_ok_invar : forall (d : preDTA) (p p' : prec_list) (sigma : signature), prec_list_ref_ok p d -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> prec_list_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) p = Some p' -> prec_list_ref_ok p' (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d)
states_kill_ref_ok_invar : forall (d : preDTA) (s s' : state) (sigma : signature), state_ref_ok s d -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> states_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) s = Some s' -> state_ref_ok s' (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d)
dta_kill_empty_states_lazy_semantics : forall (d : DTA) (t : term), reconnait d t < -> reconnait (DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy d) t
predta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_compat_check d sigma = true
predta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_compat_check d sigma = true -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
dt_kill_empty_kill_empty_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state) (sigma : signature), MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a = Some s -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> exists t : term, reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t
states_kill_empty.kill_empty_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) (m : Map bool), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (preDTA_kill m d) sigma
dt_kill_empty_kill_empty : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> (exists s : state, MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a = Some s) < -> (exists t : term, reconnaissance d a t)
predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : preDTA), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> predta_compatible d d'
dta_compat_check = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta p _ => predta_compat_check p sigma end : DTA -> signature -> bool
st_compat_check_complete : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature), st_compat_check s sigma = true -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma
st_compat_check_correct : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> st_compat_check s sigma = true
dta_kill_empty_states_semantics : forall (d : DTA) (t : term), reconnait d t < -> reconnait (DTA_kill_empty_states d) t
states_kill_aux_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (s : state) (m : Map bool) (sigma : signature), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign (states_kill_aux m s) sigma
states_kill_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (s s' : state) (m : Map bool) (sigma : signature), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> states_kill m s = Some s' -> state_correct_wrt_sign s' sigma
predta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma : preDTA -> signature -> Prop
predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign (M2 state d0 d1) sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma /\ predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma
dt_kill_empty_kill_empty_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (plp : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp p -> pl_path_true plp (dta_non_empty_states d) -> exists tl : term_list, pl_path_recon d tl plp
states_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (s s' : state), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign s' sigma -> st_compatible s s'
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
reconnait = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end : DTA -> term -> Prop
Inductive pl_path_recon : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop := pl_path_rec_nil : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_recon d tnil pl_path_nil | pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
pl_path_rec_equiv_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl
preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d < -> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)
dta_rec_term = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => rec_term p a t (essence t p) end : DTA -> term -> bool
kill_empty_correct_wrt_sign_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (m : Map bool), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign (states_kill_aux m s) sigma

```intros d sigma Href Hcorrect.
unfold DTA_ref_ok, DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy.
destruct d as [p a].
simpl.
apply DTA_kill_ref_ok_invar.
- apply Href.
- apply Hcorrect.
Qed.```

original: intros d sigma Href Hcorrect. unfold DTA_ref_ok, DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy. destruct d as [p a]. simpl. apply DTA_kill_ref_ok_invar. - apply Href. - apply Hcorrect.
